articles.title: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day 28 April 2023: Runaway star Alpha Camelopardalis - HT Tech
articles.description: Today’s NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day is a snapshot of Alpha Camelopardalis, a runaway star located about 4,000 light-years away in the long-necked constellation Camelopardalis.
articles.content: As many as 200 sextillion (200 billion trillion) stars illuminate our universe. Our Milky Way Galaxy itself has at least 100 billion stars, and there are over 100 billion galaxies in the universe. Ac… [+1758 chars]
